name: Fun With Physics (Fungus)
description:
Fun With Physics is a fun physics-based game where you shoot a physical projectile at other objects with weight and gravity. You will have unlimited projectiles. Everything except for the projectiles has 0 gravity.

Single-Player.

3D Model License: "Batarang (Batman)" (https://skfb.ly/6FYGL) by Yanez Designs is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

Controls: Spacebar = Batarang. C = Ball. F = Ball from the fixated point on the ground. Esc = Quit game.

OS Requirements: Windows 64-Bit 10 or higher.

PC Requirements: GPU = GTX 1060 or higher, CPU = Core i3-3225/Ryzen 3 3300U or higher, RAM = 8GB or higher.

Recommended: 16 GB RAM. i5 or higher, Ryzen 5 or higher. GTX 1660 Ti/Super/Ti Super or higher.

Have fun!

(If the .exe file doesn't work try the zip file)
